title: Does the postage on the ballot papers secretly contain quantities of mass chains?
subtitle: Don't feel bad if you never hear about quantum chain systems.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: As part of a sting to prevent voter fraud, the Government added either "QFS watermark" or "Quantom Water Series" to the postcards that will reveal one day the President of the United States Donald Trump as the true winner of the 2020 presidential election.
